timeline.message:
Dynamic logging for connect

Signed-off-by: Stanislav Knot <sknot@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
CountDownLatch latch2 = new CountDownLatch(1);
client.updateConnectorLoggers("localhost", PORT, desired)
.onComplete(connectorLoggers -> context.verify(() -> {
client.listConnectorLoggers("localhost", PORT).onComplete(map -> {
context.verify(() -> {
assertThat(map.result().get("org.reflections").get("level"), is("FATAL"));
assertThat(map.result().get("org.apache.zookeeper").get("level"), is("FATAL"));
assertThat(map.result().get("org.I0Itec.zkclient").get("level"), is("FATAL"));
assertThat(map.result().get("root").get("level"), is("INFO"));
assertThat(map.result().get("unknown"), is(notNullValue()));
assertThat(map.result().get("unknown").get("level"), is("DEBUG"));
async.flag();
latch2.countDown();
});
});
}));
latch2.await(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
Checkpoint async = context.checkpoint();
client.updateConnectorLoggers("localhost", PORT, desired)
.onComplete(context.succeeding())
.compose(connectorLoggers -> client.listConnectorLoggers("localhost", PORT))
.onComplete(map -> context.verify(() -> {
assertThat(map.result().get("org.reflections").get("level"), is("FATAL"));
assertThat(map.result().get("org.apache.zookeeper").get("level"), is("FATAL"));
assertThat(map.result().get("org.I0Itec.zkclient").get("level"), is("FATAL"));
assertThat(map.result().get("root").get("level"), is("INFO"));
assertThat(map.result().get("unknown"), is(notNullValue()));
assertThat(map.result().get("unknown").get("level"), is("DEBUG"));
async.flag();
});
});
}));

onComplete should verify some state and then the next call should be made in a compose, and then followed by an onComplete and so on..
timeline.author: samuel-hawker

timeline.bodyHTML:
I think you could replace this whole method with:

String root = loggers.get("root");
List<Map.Entry<String, String>> listOfEntries = new ArrayList<>(loggers.entrySet());
sort(listOfEntries, Comparator.comparing(e -> e.getKey()));
LinkedHashMap<String, String> sortedLoggers = new LinkedHashMap<>(listOfEntries);
if (root != null) {
    sortedLoggers.put("root", root);
}
return sortedLoggers;
